id.description: The unique identifier of the vocabulary item.

version.description: Version of structure. This is used to ensure that the client and server are using the same.

sourceLanguage.description: The language code of the source language (e.g., 'en' for English).

targetLanguage.description: The language code of the target language (e.g., 'de' for German).

partOfSpeech.description: The part of speech of the vocabulary item (e.g., 'Noun', 'Verb', 'Adjective', 'Phrase').

noun.description: Optional details for nouns, such as the article.

genus.description: The grammatical gender of the noun (e.g., 'maskulin', 'feminin', 'neutrum').

determinedArticle.description: The determined article of the noun (e.g., 'der', 'die', 'das').

undeterminedArticle.description: The undetermined article of the noun (e.g., 'ein', 'eine').

verb.description: Optional details for verbs, including information about the base form, conjugations, and person.

isBaseForm.description: Indicates whether this Vocabulary item represents the base form (infinitive) of the verb.

baseFormRef.description: Reference to the base form of the verb.

person.description: The grammatical person of the verb.

infinitiv.description: The infinitive form of the verb.

conjugations.description: Conjugations of the verb, structured by tense and person.

description.description: An optional, additional description or context for the meaning of the vocabulary item.

pronunciation.description: An optional pronunciation of the word or phrase (e.g., in IPA).

exampleSentenceSrc.description: An optional example sentence in the source language.

exampleSentenceTarget.description: The optional translation of the example sentence into the target language.

exampleSentenceTense.description: The optional tense of the verb in the example sentence (e.g., 'present', 'past').

relatedForms.description: An optional array of related vocabulary items.

idiomaticUsages.description: An optional array of idiomatic usages where the word or phrase has a different meaning than its literal translation.

pronunciationAudioUrl.description: Url to the audio file for pronunciation of the word or phrase.

createdAt.description: The optional timestamp of when the vocabulary item was created.

updatedAt.description: The optional timestamp of when the vocabulary item was last updated.

id.description: The unique identifier of the vocabulary item.

word.description: The word or phrase in the source language.

translation.description: The translation of the word or phrase into the target language.

IdiomaticUsageDto.description: Represents an idiomatic usage of a word or phrase.

phrase.description: The idiomatic phrase in the source language.

translation.description: The translation of the idiomatic phrase in the target language.
